      • getDuration

        public static long getDuration(android.content.Context context,
                               java.lang.String path)
        Get video's duration without ContentProvider. Because not know Uri of video.
        参数:
        context -
        path - Path of video file.
        返回:
        Duration of video, in milliseconds. Return 0 if path is null.

      • getDuration

        public static long getDuration(android.content.Context context,
                               android.net.Uri uri)
        Get video's duration from ContentProvider
        参数:
        context -
        uri - must has Uri.getScheme() equals ContentResolver.SCHEME_CONTENT
        返回:
        Duration of video, in milliseconds.
